name: CHUBORY X10 PRO GPS Drone with Camera for Adults 4K UHD, 90 Min Long Flight Time,3280 FT Long Control Range, Auto Return, Follow Me, Brushless Motor,X10 PRO-US-250707-1
short_description: 【Under 0.55lb Mid-sized Drone, No FAA Registration】Designed with a unique material composition, the X10 PRO is a remarkably valuable mid-sized GPS drone (not mini ones). Its weight is kept under 0.55lb, eliminating the need for FAA registration. This drone provides a perfect solution for hassle-free flying in the States without FAA, making it ideal for capturing stunning footage on the go.

【Brushless Motors & Long Flight Time and Control Range】Enduring alloy brushless motors feature strong wind resistance and provides a faster, quieter while more powerful flight. Equipped with 3 batteries to provide up to 90 minutes of flight time, plus a long control range of 3328 Feet, let your drone swim in the sky freely.

【Dual Positioning System】Optical Flow Positioning provides you a safer indoor flight while GPS Positioning gives a more free and stabilized outdoor flight. They also help the drone lock the height precisely and hover stably to take better photos or videos. With GPS system, the drone will automatically return home when battery is low, signal is lost or you press One Key Return, free your minds of losing the drone.

【4K UHD Photography Drone】The UHD 4K Camera offers high-resolution imagery, allowing you to capture stunning 4096x3072 photos and 2048x1080 videos. The camera features a 100° wide-angle lens that is adjustable by remote control or the app within 90°, expanding your perspective and enhancing your enjoyment of every precious moment. The 5GHz FPV transmission ensures stable and smooth video streaming.

【Powerful GPS Function】The GPS assisted intelligent flight features such as Follow Me, Tap Fly and Point of Interest enable the drone to fly automatically and free your hands and minds to do video or picture creation, and enjoy more fun.

【Perfect Travel Companion】Foldable design of the drone and the durable carrying case, allow it more portable for outdoor traveling. You can take it to anywhere and record all the wonderful moments. Besides, we offer a 1-year warranty for replacing your damaged parts and 30-day money back for any reason. Any questions, we are always here for you.

name: GPS Drones with 4K Camera for Adults Under 249g, P17 Drone with Brushless Motor 5G Transmission, 3 Batteries, Follow Me, Smart Return Home, Foldable FPV Drone for Long Distance (Black)
short_description: 【NOTE】Make sure the drone battery is fully charged before flying. To ensure battery performance, use a 5V 2A charger and the USB cable included in the accessory (charger not included) to charge the drone battery.

【GPS Intelligent Flight】The GPS drone features high precision flight and safe return. The max flight distance is 1KM. When the drone is in low battery, signal loss or you press the auto return button, it will return to around the take-off point. The flight track recorded by APP can help you find the drone quickly, no need to worry about losing it. 【Note】Please turn on the GPS mode in outdoor.

【4K Camera】Drone with camera supports 4K photo and 1080P video, 90° electric adjustable camera and 120° wide angle can expand your field of view, WiFi transmission ensures longer lasting and smoother image.

【Powerful Motors】Weighs less than 249g, no need to register with FAA. Drone equipped with upgraded brushless motors bring effective and stable flight, can resist the wind of level 4. Foldable drone and easy carrying bag are convenient to carry the drone, especially suitable for traveling and camping!

【Long Flight Time】The 3 replaceable smart batteries will fly for about 15-18 minutes each time after fully charging, and the max flight time is 45-54 minutes in total. Battery operating time may vary slightly depending on the environment. Please use 5V/2A charger and original charging cable to charge the battery before flying.

【Multi-function Flight】Push the joystick to unlock different flight fun, such as auto-following, trajectory flight, hover flight, gesture photo, 3 speeds and more. Clear visualization screen allows you to quickly understand the flight mode, range, signal, battery status, especially suitable for long-distance flight.

【Warm Tips】Please fully charge the battery before each use. Before taking off, please choose an open place to fly this 4K drone to avoid signal blockage, and make sure the GPS signal is strong; please complete the calibration of the compass and gyroscope. If you have any questions, please message us for solutions, we will reply within 24 hours.

name: DJI Mini 4 Pro Drone Fly More Combo Plus with RC 2 Controller (With Screen) Folding Drone with 4K Video, Under 249g, 45 Mins Flight Time, Vision Sensing 3 Batteries Bundle with 2x 128GB Memory Card, CPS 2 Year Warranty + Pilot Kit
short_description: This Bundle Includes: DJI Mini 4 Pro Drone with RC 2 Controller (with screen), 3 x Intelligent Flight Battery Plus, 2x SanDisk 128GB Extreme microSD Memory Card, High USB Speed Memory Card Reader, Shoulder Bag , Drone Photography Backpack, Two-Way Charging Hub, USB-C PD Cable, USB-C Cable, Gimbal Protector, Propeller Holder, 3 x Pair of Propellers, 18 x Propeller Screw, Screwdriver, Drone Landing Pad, Camera Lens Cleaning Kit, 6-Slot Memory Card Wallet, CPS 2 Year Warranty

Fly More Combo Plus - This version of the Mini 4 Pro includes the Fly More Combo Plus group of accessories, which are meant to better equip you for a long day of aerial filming. The Fly More Combo Plus includes two additional intelligent flight batteries, providing you with up to 90 additional minutes of flight time, a two-way charging hub to help you recharge your batteries quickly, and a shoulder bag to carry your gear to your shooting location.
Requires FAA Registration, Up to 45 Minutes of Flight Time, Automatic Shooting Modes, Up to 4K100 Video & 48MP Raw StillS, RC 2 Controller Included with built-in LCD screen

Complete Protection - Incorporating omnidirectional obstacle avoidance for the first time in the series, the Mini 4 Pro is fully protected from accidents and crashes with six fisheye and downward binocular vision sensors, a 3D ToF depth sensor, and a downward auxiliary light. The automatic avoidance is utilized by the advanced return to home feature, complex flight modes, such as MasterShots, and APAS (Advanced Pilot Assistance Systems) for smooth video capture.

Fly Farther with OcuSync 4 - Range is dramatically improved with OcuSync 4, giving the Mini 4 Pro the ability to transmit from up to 12.4 miles away, a significant improvement over the 7.5 miles of the Mini 3 Pro. Even at this range, live view quality is improved to 1080p60 for smoother footage.

Advanced RTH - The drone can intelligently set a course and return to its takeoff point if needed, and now, with the Mini 4 Pro, this feature can take advantage of omnidirectional obstacle avoidance to ensure it makes it back in one piece.
Night Mode - Take clearer images and videos of low-light areas with multi-scale noise reduction.
Cruise Control - Maintain a steady speed without having to continuously push on the controller stick.
product_description: Fly safer and farther than ever before with the Mini 4 Pro Drone Fly More Combo Plus with RC 2 Controller from DJI. Significant upgrades have been made to both vision sensing and transmission range compared to the last generation. Instead of tridirectional, the Mini 4 Pro has omnidirectional obstacle avoidance for complete protection. Using OcuSync 4, the flight range is improved to up to 12.4 miles vs. the 7.5 miles of the Mini 3 Pro. Other new features include slower motion in 4K at 100 fps and complex route planning using ActiveTrack. The Mini 4 Pro remains beginner-friendly at roughly 8.8 oz with a host of automatic flight modes, in addition to true vertical shooting for social media-ready footage without post-processing. Please note that this bundle includes Intelligent Flight Battery Plus, which trades additional weight for extended flight times and distances. This extra weight will make the Mini 4 Pro heavier than 250 grams, and (as of this writing) it will require FAA registration. This Bundle Includes:

name: Ruko U11MINI 4K, Drones with Camera for Adults 4K Video 8K Photo, Under 249g, 3-Axis Gimbal EIS, 20000ft FPV Transmission, AI Takeoff/Landing, Auto Return, GPS with Beeper, Beginner (96-Min Flight)
short_description: 【Ultra-Portable Pocket Drone】Weighing under 249g, the FAA-exempt U11MINI 4K pocket drone captures 4K aerial footage anytime, anywhere - no limits, no hassle!

【High Value & Ideal Gift】You'll get one 8K camera drone with 3 smart batteries, a sleek rechargeable transmitter, 3 charging cables, 3 types of connecting cables, extra propellers, extra controller stickers, an exquisite carrying case and gift-ready packaging - A thoughtful gift for anyone who loves drones or photography.

【Stunning 8K Photo & 4K Video】Featuring a 1/2-inch CMOS sensor and 48MP resolution, the professional-grade camera drone captures 8K UHD photos and 4K/30fps videos to preserve your family moments and daily adventures in stunning clarity.

【Stable Shots, Clear Vision】Equipped with a 3-axis brushless gimbal and EIS stabilization, the U11MINI 4K gimbal drone delivers buttery-smooth 4K videos. The upgraded auto-cruise control ensures steady footage, even during extended flights.

【AI Takeoff/Landing & Safer Flight】The U11MINI 4K’s AI Takeoff/Landing system, paired with quadruple intelligent positioning (GPS, barometric altitude hold, TOF, and optical flow), ensures effortless, safe, and precise flight control.

【Beginner Friendly】Triple auto-return modes (one-click return, low battery return, signal loss return), combined with adjustable return point settings and a built-in beeper for easy location tracking. Never worry about losing your drone. Effortless operation and intuitive app, just be free to enjoy your first flight with U11MINI 4K!

【96-Min Flight Time & RK3.0 Smart Charge】3 batteries offering up to 96 minutes total. Supports PD 3.0 fast charging and allows all batteries to charge at once - keep ready wherever you go - indoors or outdoors. For optimal charging performance, it is recommended to use the Ruko PD65W charger or R299 portable power station.
【20,000ft Range Digital Real-time Transmission】Fly further and smoother with R2 digital transmission system - up to 20,000ft range without relying on Wi-Fi or encountering signal interference issues.

【Considerate Customer Service】Ruko provides 24/7 customer service, 30 days of return or exchange and 90 days free warranty. If you have any questions about our products, please feel free to contact us at any time.

name: Potensic ATOM 2 Drone with Camera for Adults 4K Video, 8K Photo, Under 249g, 3-Axis Gimbal, 10KM Transmission, AI Track, Vertical Shooting, AI Night Shot, QuickShots, Fly More Combo (96-Min Flight)
short_description: 【𝟖𝐊 𝐏𝐡𝐨𝐭𝐨, 𝟒𝐊 𝐇𝐃𝐑 𝐕𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐨】Equipped with a 1/2'' Sony CMOS sensor, it captures 𝟒𝟖𝐌𝐏 𝐩𝐡𝐨𝐭𝐨𝐬 and records 𝟒𝐊/𝟑𝟎𝐟𝐩𝐬 𝐇𝐃𝐑 stable videos within a 𝟑-𝐚𝐱𝐢𝐬 𝐠𝐢𝐦𝐛𝐚𝐥. The F1.8 aperture and 4-in-1 pixels improve low-light performance, details, and color.
【𝐔𝐧𝐝𝐞𝐫 𝟐𝟒𝟗𝐠, 𝐍𝐨 𝐑𝐞𝐠𝐢𝐬𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐑𝐞𝐪𝐮𝐢𝐫𝐞𝐝】ATOM 2’s compact and lightweight design does not need FAA and Remote ID Registration. You can take it to capture exciting moments anytime, anywhere.

【𝐁𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐍𝐞𝐰 𝐑𝐞𝐦𝐨𝐭𝐞, 𝐌𝐚𝐱 𝟏𝟎𝐊𝐌 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐦𝐢𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧】The newly upgraded remote control features a directional antenna for 𝐞𝐧𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞𝐝 𝐬𝐞𝐧𝐬𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐢𝐭𝐲 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐩𝐫𝐞𝐜𝐢𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧. With built-in PixSync 4.0 technology, the ATOM 2 offers excellent anti-interference with a control range of up to 10 km and 𝟏𝟎𝟖𝟎𝐩/𝟑𝟎𝐟𝐩𝐬 𝐥𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐯𝐢𝐞𝐰 𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐦𝐢𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧.

【𝐀𝐈 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐜𝐤 & 𝐀𝐈 𝐒𝐭𝐮𝐧𝐧𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐍𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐒𝐡𝐨𝐭】Powered by our own AI model, ATOM 2 has premium object locking and imagery technology. Frame your target to access tracking modes: 𝐒𝐩𝐨𝐭𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭, 𝐅𝐨𝐥𝐥𝐨𝐰, 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐏𝐚𝐫𝐚𝐥𝐥𝐞𝐥. In addition, it makes it easy to capture 𝐜𝐫𝐢𝐬𝐩 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐜𝐥𝐞𝐚𝐫 𝐯𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐨𝐬 𝐚𝐭 𝐧𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭.

【𝐀𝐦𝐚𝐳𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐕𝐢𝐬𝐮𝐚𝐥 𝐄𝐱𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞】ATOM 2 has various photo modes, like 2.7K 𝐕𝐞𝐫𝐭𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐥 𝐒𝐡𝐨𝐨𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠, 4x digital zoom, and panoramic, and new video modes: 𝐃𝐨𝐥𝐥𝐲 𝐙𝐨𝐨𝐦, 𝐒𝐥𝐨𝐰 𝐌𝐨𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧, and QuickShots to create cinematic videos. SmartTransfer up to 25 MB/s is ready for sharing on social media!

【𝐁𝐞𝐠𝐢𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐫-𝐟𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐝𝐥𝐲 𝐅𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭】 ATOM 2 offers precise GNSS positioning, a 𝐜𝐮𝐬𝐭𝐨𝐦𝐢𝐳𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐇𝐎𝐌𝐄 𝐏𝐨𝐢𝐧𝐭, Cruise Control, Auto Takeoff and Landing, and Smart Return-to-Home (𝐑𝐓𝐇), delivering a smooth and enjoyable flying experience.

【𝟏.𝟑𝐡 𝐅𝐚𝐬𝐭 𝐂𝐡𝐚𝐫𝐠𝐞, 𝟗𝟔 𝐌𝐢𝐧𝐬 𝐋𝐨𝐧𝐠 𝐅𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭】ATOM 2 Fly More Combo has a charging hub that supports full quick-charge for three batteries at once in 1.3 hours. The 3-battery kit provides ample time for exploration.
𝐏𝐨𝐭𝐞𝐧𝐬𝐢𝐜 𝐂𝐚𝐫𝐞 is available on our 𝐍𝐞𝐰 𝐀𝐩𝐩, 𝐏𝐨𝐭𝐞𝐧𝐬𝐢𝐜 𝐄𝐯𝐞. You can enjoy the flight without concern. The in-app chat service provides instant support and hassle-free assistance anytime.

name: Drone with Camera 4K for Kids Adults, Brushless Motor Mini Foldable RC Drones with Propeller Guards for Beginners, One Key Take Off/Land, Voice Control, Anti-Lost Alarm, Gift Toys for Men Boys
short_description: 【Ultimate Fusion: 4K HD Camera, Image Stabilization, and FPV】This drone with camera features a 130° wide-angle 4K lens and 90° adjustable view, ensuring every moment is captured in high definition. With smooth FPV transmission, it’s ideal for drones for kids and adults, providing an immersive flight experience.

【Brushless Drones: Stability, Efficiency, Wind Resistance】Compared to brushed models, brushless drones with camera for adults 4k offer longer lifespan and greater stability, using less power. They eliminate overheating issues and excel in high-speed conditions while resisting wind for stable flights.

【Experience Unmatched Safety】Designed with safety in mind, this drone for kids features a child lock to prevent accidental takeoffs and propeller guards for safe indoor flying. The Anti-Lost Alarm activates after 10 minutes of inactivity, and low battery alerts plus an emergency stop function help avoid accidents.

【Dual-Battery Upgrade: Longer Flight, More Portable】The mini drone offers up to 28 minutes of flight time with its dual enhanced batteries. It charges quickly with USB 3.0 technology, and its foldable design plus storage box make it portable. Safety features like Overcharge and Short Circuit Protection give peace of mind during use.

【Ultra-lightweight, No FAA or Remote ID Registration Required】The PLEGBLE PL516 is a drone with camera 4k, weighing under 250 grams, making it exempt from FAA or remote ID registration. This drones for kids and adults is perfect for hassle-free flying in the U.S., capturing stunning shots without the need for complicated registration.

【Multifunctional Control Experience】Convenient, Safe, and Flexible Operation: In addition to remote control, this camera drone supports app and voice control for convenience. Gesture photo capture is highly responsive, while optical flow positioning ensures stable flight, even with weak signals. One-key takeoff/landing and altitude hold make it easy for beginners to control.

【Notes】1. To ensure the stability of the flight control system during flight, be sure to use the propeller guards for flying. 2. Ensure a smooth flying experience by keeping the drone’s orientation aligned with yours during outdoor flights—this essential for accurate control；3. For flight stability, use speed mode 1 for indoor flight and speed modes 3 for outdoor flight.

【PLEGBLE: Elevating Your Drone Experience】Explore the powerful features of the PL-516 upgraded drone to enhance your flying and shooting experience. We provide comprehensive video tutorials and instructions to help you fully unleash its potential. Need assistance? Feel free to contact customer support for problem-solving.

【Safety and After Sale Service】: ①Tutorial videos help you master flight quickly. ②User guidance or flight issue support: For any technical support or inquiries about drone accessories, please reach out to our Support Team for service and assistance.

name: GPS Drone with Camera 4K, Under 249g, 45 Mins Flight, Brushless Motor, Light, Auto Follow, Tap Fly & Circle Fly, One Key Start, Foldable Drone for Adults Beginners
short_description: Adjustable Anti-Shake Camera: HK33 drone features an F2.15 110° wide-angle lens with physical vibration reduction and a 90° remote control adjuster, allowing you to capture the perfect shot. It delivers high-resolution images at 4096x3072P and records videos at 2048x1088P, which can be saved to your Micro SD card or directly on your mobile device.

5G WiFi Transmission: Equipped with an upgraded 5G WiFi connection, the drone provides stable FPV video transmission up to 985 feet (300 meters). With a built-in repeater in the remote controller, the maximum flight distance extends to 1640 feet (500 meters), allowing you to explore diverse terrain and capture stunning aerial photos with ease.

Extended 45 Mins Flight Time: Equipped with two powerful 1800mAh batteries, this drone offers a total flight time of 45 minutes, providing ample time for uninterrupted aerial filming. Say goodbye to worries about sudden landings due to low battery. The battery indicator light keeps you informed of the current capacity, allowing you to estimate remaining flight time and recharge as needed.

GPS Intelligent Function: Equipped with an advanced GPS module, this drone ensures a safe and reliable flight experience. It supports GPS Auto Return, GPS Follow, Route Planning, and Fly Around for an enjoyable and versatile flight. With GPS-assisted flight, the drone will automatically return home if it loses signal, goes out of range, or has low battery power, so you’ll have to worry about it flying away.

More Stable Flight with Brushless Motors: Featuring brushless motors, this drone provides strong wind resistance up to level 5, delivering enhanced stability in flight. The powerful performance and steady control make it smooth and easy to operate for beginners.

Lightweight & Portable: The HK33 drone weighs under 250g, eliminating the need for FAA registration and offering a hassle-free flying experience. Its foldable design and included carrying case make it easy to store and highly portable, perfect for outdoor adventures.
